dashboard.title: HOME
dashboard.subtitle: View your available resources and an overview of your account
dashboard.welcome_description:
From the dashboard, you can manage and create servers.

Upgrade your servers: you can earn free {{currency}} via our Discord {{discord}} or through other methods.
dashboard.resources_below_zero: Your resources are somehow below zero. Please click here to fix it or your servers could get suspended. If that doesn't work, try editing your servers to fix it.

daily_reward.title: Your daily reward is available.
daily_reward.description:
As a thank you for being a {{name}} user, each day you can claim a reward of {{amount}} ({{currency}})
Click the button below to claim your reward!

advent_calendar.title: Advent Calendar
advent_calendar.description: Our advent calendar has started on November 11 and will end on December 25!

support.title: Support
support.description: If you need any assistance, feel free to reach out to our support team via Discord or the support ticket system.

alerts.daily_claimed: Action completed - daily rewards ({{amount}} {{currency}}) have been claimed!
alerts.server_created: Action completed - provisioning has started for your server, it may take up to 5 minutes to complete.
alerts.server_modified: Action completed - the server's resources have been modified.
alerts.server_deleted: Action completed - the server has been deleted.
